page.title: 13Whitecroft Hospital
page.content: {Steven Allington discovered -}White- croft has always been a psychiatric hospital. It was designed as an asylum The main group of buildings, of red brick, were started in 1882 and were completed in 1886. More buildings have been added as the attitudes to mental health have changed. Alterations have ben made to the internal layout. {Mental illness -}This can come on you at any time of life. These people are treated in Whitecroft Hospital. Today it is policy treatment to get as many as possible living in the community. {Mental handicap -}These people are born with their illness. Many are not capable of caring for themselves. The young ones live in Newport at Castle View and the rest at Longford Hosp. Children from{Chillerton Primary Sch. go to entertain patients as well as sending gifts at Harvest Time.
